description: This file demonstrates how to instrument an agno agent with OpenInference and send traces to Langfuse, including setting up environment variables, defining data models, and configuring the agent with tools and response models.

classes.name: MarketArea
classes.description: Enumeration of market regions including USA, UK, EU, and ASIA.

classes.name: StockPrice
classes.description: Data model representing stock price information with fields for price, symbol, date, and area.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Method called on the agent to print the response for a given prompt.
